00019 class ULRUHash

00085         ULRUList< SBinItem* >   _lruList;

00100 //----------------------------------------------------------
00101 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00102 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::ULRUHash( unsigned int size )
00103 : _table( new SBinItem* [ 2 * size ] )
00104 , _lruList( size )
00105 , _count( 0 )
00106 , _size( size )
00107 , _mask( 2 * size - 1 )
00108 {
00110         B_ASSERT( IsPow2( size ) );
00111 
00113         MemSet( _table, 0, 2 * size * sizeof( SBinItem* ) );
00114 
00116         _linkFree = _linkMem = new SBinItem[ size ];
00117         _linkFree[ size - 1 ].next = 0;
00118         for ( unsigned int i = 1; i < size; ++i )
00119                 _linkFree[ i - 1 ].next = _linkFree + i;
00120 }
00121 
00122 //----------------------------------------------------------
00123 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00124 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::~ULRUHash()
00125 {
00127         delete[] _linkMem;
00128         delete[] _table;
00129 }

00136 //----------------------------------------------------------
00137 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00138 void*
00139 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::Insert( _KeyHash keyHash, const _Key& key, const _T& item )
00140 {
00142         if ( _count == _size )
00143         {
00145                 SBinItem* removeItem = _lruList.Get( _lruList.GetLRUItem() );
00146                 Remove( removeItem );
00147         }
00148 
00150         unsigned int bin = keyHash & _mask;
00151 
00153         SBinItem* newLink = _linkFree;
00154         _linkFree = _linkFree->next;
00155 
00157         newLink->item = item;
00158         newLink->key = key;
00159         newLink->keyHash = keyHash;
00160         newLink->age = _lruList.Add( newLink );
00161         newLink->next = _table[ bin ];
00162 
00164         _table[ bin ] = newLink;
00165 
00167         ++_count;
00168 
00170         return newLink;
00171 }
00172 
00173 //----------------------------------------------------------
00174 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00175 void*
00176 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::Insert( _T& removed, _KeyHash keyHash, const _Key& key, const _T& item )
00177 {
00179         if ( _count == _size )
00180         {
00182                 SBinItem* removeItem = _lruList.Get( _lruList.GetLRUItem() );
00183                 removed = removeItem->item;
00184                 Remove( removeItem );
00185         }
00186 
00188         unsigned int bin = keyHash & _mask;
00189 
00191         SBinItem* newLink = _linkFree;
00192         _linkFree = _linkFree->next;
00193 
00195         newLink->item = item;
00196         newLink->key = key;
00197         newLink->keyHash = keyHash;
00198         newLink->age = _lruList.Add( newLink );
00199         newLink->next = _table[ bin ];
00200 
00202         _table[ bin ] = newLink;
00203 
00205         ++_count;
00206 
00208         return newLink;
00209 }
00210 
00211 //----------------------------------------------------------
00212 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00213 void*
00214 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::Remove( void* handle )
00215 {
00217         B_ASSERT( handle != 0 );
00218 
00220         SBinItem* item = ( SBinItem* )handle;
00221         
00223         unsigned int bin = item->keyHash & _mask;
00224 
00226         SBinItem** cur = _table + bin;
00227         while ( *cur != 0 )
00228         {
00230                 if ( *cur == item )
00231                 {
00233                         *cur = item->next;
00234                         break;
00235                 }
00236 
00238                 cur = &( ( *cur )->next );
00239         }
00240 
00242         void* newer = _lruList.Remove( item->age );
00243         if ( newer )
00244                 newer = _lruList.Get( newer );
00245 
00247         item->next = _linkFree;
00248         _linkFree = item;
00249 
00251         --_count;
00252 
00254         return newer;
00255 }
00256 
00257 //----------------------------------------------------------
00258 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00259 void
00260 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::Clear()
00261 {
00264         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i <= _mask; ++i )
00265         {
00266                 while ( _table[ i ] )
00267                         Remove( _table[ i ] );
00268         }
00269 }

00271 //----------------------------------------------------------
00272 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00273 void*
00274 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::FindFirst( _KeyHash keyHash ) const
00275 {
00277         unsigned int bin = keyHash & _mask;
00278 
00280         SBinItem* item = _table[ bin ];
00281         if ( item == 0 )
00282                 return 0;
00283 
00285         if ( item->keyHash == keyHash )
00286                 return item;
00287 
00290         return FindNext( item, keyHash );
00291 }
00292 
00293 //----------------------------------------------------------
00294 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00295 void*
00296 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::FindNext( void* handle, _KeyHash keyHash ) const
00297 {
00299         SBinItem* item = ( SBinItem* )handle;
00300         item = item->next;
00301         while ( item != 0 )
00302         {
00304                 if ( item->keyHash == keyHash )
00305                         return item;
00306 
00308                 item = item->next;
00309         }
00310 
00313         return 0;
00314 }
00315 
00316 //----------------------------------------------------------
00317 template < typename _Key, class _T, typename _KeyHash >
00318 void*
00319 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::Find( _KeyHash keyHash, const _Key& key ) const
00320 {
00322         void* item = FindFirst( keyHash );
00323         while ( item != 0 )
00324         {
00327                 if ( ( ( SBinItem* )item )->key == key )
00328                         return item;
00329 
00331                 item = FindNext( item, keyHash );
00332         }
00333 
00336         return 0;
00337 }

00396 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::GetOldest() const
00397 {
00398         if ( _count == 0 )
00399                 return 0;
00400 
00402         return _lruList.Get( _lruList.GetLRUItem() );

00408 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::GetNewest() const
00409 {
00410         if ( _count == 0 )
00411                 return 0;
00412 
00414         return _lruList.Get( _lruList.GetMRUItem() );
00415 }

00420 ULRUHash< _Key, _T, _KeyHash >::GetOlder( void* item ) const

00426
